publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1787 Elaine Thomson: Community Nurses and Health Visitors—That the Parliament notes the key role of community nurses and health visitors in community care, and that use of a car is essential in carrying out that role; believes that the practices of requiring these health workers to pay parking charges in the course of their work, and of providing car leasing arrangements on different terms in different Trusts, should be reviewed in the interests of efficiency and equity, and further believes that a uniform approach to these issues should be established throughout the National Health Service in Scotland.
S1M-1787 Community Nurses and Health Visitors (lodged on 23 March 2001) Brian Adam*, Rhoda Grant*
S1M-1787 Community Nurses and Health Visitors (lodged on 23 March 2001) Mike Watson*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*
S1M-1787 Community Nurses and Health Visitors (lodged on 23 March 2001) Dr Elaine Murray*, Nora Radcliffe*, Tommy Sheridan*, Trish Godman*
S1M-1787 Community Nurses and Health Visitors (lodged on 23 March 2001) Hugh Henry*, Maureen Macmillan*

S1M-1787 Elaine Thomson: Community Nurses and Health Visitors—That the Parliament notes the key role of community nurses and health visitors in community care, and that use of a car is essential in carrying out that role; believes that the practices of requiring these health workers to pay parking charges in the course of their work, and of providing car leasing arrangements on different terms in different Trusts, should be reviewed in the interests of efficiency and equity, and further believes that a uniform approach to these issues should be established throughout the National Health Service in Scotland. Supported by: Brian Adam, Rhoda Grant, Mike Watson, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Dr Elaine Murray, Nora Radcliffe, Tommy Sheridan, Trish Godman, Hugh Henry, Maureen Macmillan
S1M-1787 Community Nurses and Health Visitors (lodged on 23 March 2001) Mr Michael McMahon*
S1M-1787 Community Nurses and Health Visitors (lodged on 23 March 2001) Christine Grahame*, Tricia Marwick*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*
S1M-1787 Community Nurses and Health Visitors (lodged on 23 March 2001) Karen Whitefield*
S1M-1787 Community Nurses and Health Visitors (lodged on 23 March 2001) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S1M-1787 Community Nurses and Health Visitors (lodged on 23 March 2001) Michael Russell*, Helen Eadie*

S1M-1787 Elaine Thomson: Community Nurses and Health Visitors—That the Parliament notes the key role of community nurses and health visitors in community care, and that use of a car is essential in carrying out that role; believes that the practices of requiring these health workers to pay parking charges in the course of their work, and of providing car leasing arrangements on different terms in different Trusts, should be reviewed in the interests of efficiency and equity, and further believes that a uniform approach to these issues should be established throughout the National Health Service in Scotland. Supported by: Brian Adam, Rhoda Grant, Mike Watson, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Dr Elaine Murray, Nora Radcliffe, Tommy Sheridan, Trish Godman, Hugh Henry, Maureen Macmillan, Mr Michael McMahon, Christine Grahame, Tricia Marwick, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Karen Whitefield, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Michael Russell, Helen Eadie
S1M-1787 Community Nurses and Health Visitors (lodged on 23 March 2001) Fergus Ewing*
S1M-1787 Community Nurses and Health Visitors (lodged on 23 March 2001) Mr Jamie Stone*, Cathy Peattie*

S1M-1787 Elaine Thomson: Community Nurses and Health Visitors—That the Parliament notes the key role of community nurses and health visitors in community care, and that use of a car is essential in carrying out that role; believes that the practices of requiring these health workers to pay parking charges in the course of their work, and of providing car leasing arrangements on different terms in different Trusts, should be reviewed in the interests of efficiency and equity, and further believes that a uniform approach to these issues should be established throughout the National Health Service in Scotland.
